Title: Requires residential real property managers to be licensed by secretary of state
Summary: Requires residential real property managers or any firm employing a property manager, contracting with a property manager or contracting to provide a property manager to file a registration statement with the secretary of state and to be certified from an approved certifying organization.
LawCode: Add Art 12-D ยง448, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to providing certification and registration requirements for property managers of cooperatives and condominiums
